item.title: Trump signs executive order targeting education accrediting system
item.description: President Trump expanded his assault on woke cultures in America's education system with executive orders signed Wednesday.

item.description: President Donald Trump said Wednesday that Canada would "cease to exist" if it weren't for the United States - comments that came just days before Can...

item.title: Trump warns that a tax hike on the wealthiest Americans would drive them out of the country
item.description: President Trump said a tax on millionaires would be "disruptive" and drive them from the United States

item.title: Feds left billions in tainted pandemic loans in the hands of potential fraudsters
